moves.1... e5: i was actually hoping for cr so i could play against a silciain.

moves.8... Nf6 9. Nd5: starting an attack plus grabbing a nice square
moves.10... Ra7 11. Re1 b5: forceing the bishop sac which i was ready for.
moves.12. Bxb5 axb5 13. Bg5: attacking hoping he'll take the bait.
moves.14. exd5+ Ne7: he may have saved it for the moment.
moves.15. h3 Qc4: move the queen around a lil

moves.19... h6 20. Bxe7: he has to take with the bshop to stop the check.

moves.21. Nxd6+ Kd7 22. Nxf7 Rf8 23. Rad1 Ke8: passed pawn is avalueable as a rook here.
moves.24... Rxf7 25. Rxe7+ Raxe7: i almost took the rook but i thought better.
moves.27. Qb7+ Ke6: i sat for 2 days trying to decide if i coule take the rook or force a mate. i opted for the mate attempt.
moves.28. Qc8+ Red7: he is fighting this all the way this i the only chance to back out or go for the mate and hope it works.
moves.29. Qe8+ Rfe7 30. Qxg6+: gotta keep checking and marching him to where i can mate him
moves.30... Ke5 31. Qh5+: hen might have a repeated check here but  am not sure

moves.33. Rd3+ Ke2: ah now he is in mate territory.
moves.34. f4+: only 1 move he has and thats E1.
